mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, userName, subject, content, created, hitCount, saveFileName, originalFileName) VALUES (bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{saveFileName}, #{originalFileName})
mapper.select: SELECT num, userId, userName, subject, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, hitCount, saveFileName FROM bbs ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
